item.title: Welcome to cs1010!
item.description: Welcome to cs1010! This is the public course website for UVA’s cs1010 Spring 2024 course. Our first class meeting will be on Thursday, January 18 (11:00am in Olsson Hall 009). More material will be posted here as the beginning of the semester approaches.
